mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Goodwins, David
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Pomeroy, Meigs Co., Ohio [Pomeroy, Meigs County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Goodwins, David Patient Age: 50. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot wound of left shoulder. Bullet entering acromial extremity of clavicle fracturing clavicle and passing backwards to exit at the spine of scapula slightly fracturing it. Location Wounded: In act[ion] at Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Nature of Wound: Bullet. Result: Transferred to Parkersburg, West Virginia 1864/09/27.
